step_feedback.feedback: Good job squeezing your shoulder blades together!  Try to keep your elbows closer to your body for better form.
Remember to make a circular motion with your shoulders.  Focus on a smoother, controlled movement.
Your shoulder movement is a bit jerky. Try to maintain a slow, controlled circular motion throughout the exercise. Remember to breathe deeply.

exercise_summary: You performed the shoulder rolls exercise.  Remember to keep your elbows close to your body and maintain a smooth circular motion.  Deep breathing will help improve the exercise's effectiveness.
